title: Cozy fit and maintains warmth on morning chills - Fit as expected
body: Enough said... I have a new favorite sweater to wear when the mornings are cold and for the Winter months. Also, I wash this sweater with care and take cautious of the settings I put on the washer machine and dryer. :)

title: I like a zip up jacket
body: I like a zip up jacket, and this one is light enough to be used in the spring and fall. Zipper can stick some but overall  really nice.

title: Great zippered hoodies!
body: Love love love these comfy soft zippered hoodies. Fit perfectly and hold up after several washings, including the zipper!

title: great quality product

title: casual comfort
body: Good fit, no surprises, good-looking "casual-wear".

title: Jacket is nice but not as thick as I expected
body: Jacket is nice but not as thick as I expected. It does fit well even if you have a belly. I would definitely purchase another.

title: Fit AWESOME
body: My husband is 6.1 and VERY broad shoulders.  i got XXL just incase.  He wears it often when it's crisp outside.

title: Four Stars

title: Five Stars

title: happy with this purchase
body: This purchase was delivered very quickly..fit my oldest grandson well, was soft and well made. I know he will get years of use from this and it looks great on him.

title: Too big
body: I'm 5'7" and 145lbs, on the thin side but Ive always bought size medium jackets for over 30 years and it was always the right size, however this Medium is much too large, it would have to shrink %15 or so to fit to what I think is right.  Very very roomy with long sleeves.  I did NOT wash it bec I didn't want to take a chance of it not shrinking enough, I returned it.  The fabric is a bit thin like other reviewers say, but not unusually so.  Besides the extra roominess, I like this jacket and style, espc. on the gray one, you have the black liner, it looks sharp.

title: tops in hoodies!
body: great hoodie...fit better than a glove...THANKS!i would definitely recommend this hoodie to my friends!

title: Four Stars
body: Comfy & holds up to the weather it's designed for.

title: Good quality, but runs larger than expected
body: Nice price and good quality. The design is basic but adorable. However, when it says Small, it means US-Small, but L for Asia, so it's really runs too larger for me (165 cm, 54kg). However, considering it only cost me $15, I would recommend if you really know your size.水洗标上注明了S是美国码，相当于亚洲的L码。165/54表示根本Hold不住啊

title: Love this hoodie!
body: This hoodie is great!  The fit is perfect, the feel is great and it's not to heavy and not too light.  I purchased 2 of them, but I may wind up buying one in every color since I like it so much.

title: Not bad, but like others the sweatshirt was ordered with ...
body: As described by everyone else...the product photos are deceiving.The zipper and draw strings ARE NOT WHITE.For the granite heather color, the zipper and draw strings are basically the same color as the sweat shirt.Not bad, but like others the sweatshirt was ordered with the impression that the zipper and draw strings would be white. As clearly shown in the photo.Debating whether to return. Fits ok. A medium is really a ML or medium-large.

title: Hoodie review
body: Haven't used this hoodie yet as the weather has bbe so warm.. Fits oerfectly and just waiting fir cikder nights.

title: Three Stars

title: Very well made for the price!  Fits great, too.
body: Nice and thick, well made hoodie.  Fits true to size, good zipper, and thick shoe-lace type strings for the good.  Deep pockets too.  Color and picture are accurate. Arrived in about a week.

title: Five Stars
body: This jacket is exactly what I expected and needed.

title: Five Stars

title: Worth for the money
body: The product I purchased is worth for the money and fits as expected. The quality of the material is also too good.

title: Good for price
body: I do not like the tight fitting wrist cuff but otherwise it is a comfortable, lightweight and keeps me warm in typical New Jersey fall weather. If you're looking for something that is decent for the price and looks nice, i'd recommend this hoodie.

title: Awesom shirt
body: I was Very happy when it got to me, GREAT quality I know this is NOT a comment related to the seller.......but it got to me quick and without a problem(that's what I look for in an amazon retailer)

body: They should change the name of Red to "Neon" or something similar. I feel the picture doesn't accurately display the flamboyance of this red.

title: Better than Hanes (sorry Jordan)
body: This wasn't for me personally, but for my friend. He loved it because it was a little classier than the Hanes offering for this pricing. It was thicker too. Colors were rich looking and the sizing was acurate. He was very pleased with this purchase.

title: Fits great
body: This is a nice jacket. Good quality material, not too heavy and not too light. The hood lays flat, which I like. I haven't washed it yet, but the material doesn't seem like the type that will shrink. I wear it alone or under a parka when it gets really cold. All in all, I really like it.

title: great product
body: it fits me perfectly and even better it is good looking and nice and warm. I am considering buying another

title: A bit large but OH SO COMFY!!
body: I ordered three Full Zip Hoodies.  The are very well made and feel warm and comfy on cold days!! I wear them to walk my dog daily.Enjoy!

title: Five Stars

title: love it
body: I've always got this on.  whether I'm going to grocery store or sitting around watching tv.  very comfortable and warm.

title: Excellent Value for Price
body: Great value for an every day sweatshirt. Excellent medium weight sweatshirt. Great value for the price.

title: Exactly as I was expecting
body: Received well within expected timeframe.  Fits well.  I got this to wear in the office (as I have no control over the thermostat) and it works great!  I'm no longer shivering from the cold at the end of the day.

title: Four Stars
body: It's a hoodie and it is very nice for the money

title: It's great!
body: Soft, warm, not too bulky. It's a great item!

title: Excellent product, exceeded expectations.
body: I was prepared to be disappointed by this $22 item, ordering clothing on-line is always chancy.I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived.Overall quality, feel, and appearance are good.  Would have liked it if it had a YKK zipper, since thats what seems to fail on my hoodies first, but you can't have everything for $22. Zipper seems adequate, but not very substantial.  Time will tell how well it holds up.Hood:One reviewer commented on the hood being too small. Guess it depends on body size vs. head size.  I'm a pretty large guy with a large head. Ordered 2XX and the hood is large enough to come down my eyebrows.Warmth:Seems a good compromise between heavy and light.  I bought it for wear during the fall/winter as my primary knock-about-the-house wear (along with the matching pants). Works well in that regard.Did take it out for a 1-mile walk in 50 degree weather and I was quite warm and comfortable.Have washed it one time and noticed no change in feel or appearance. Did add quite a bit to the link catcher, so I'd suggest washing by itself the first couple of times.I like it well enough I'm going to order another in a different color.Edit: I did get a second one, and overall ths same qaulity.  As I suspected, the zippers may become an issue.  On my first one the zipper was easy to use and smooth.  On the second one the zipper is hard to get started and not as smooth.

title: Good as advertized
body: fits well. Feels good.Like the design and the comfort.

title: Five Stars
body: Excellent

title: Delicious!
body: Súper software, Pretty! I boight This sweters for my husband and he is VERY happy with it. Is soft, Pretty, not TO heavy

title: My new favorite garment
body: I love this thing. It is exceptionally comfortable and soft, keeps me dry, and looks pretty good too. Nice big pockets too. You can't go wrong.

title: Four Stars
body: It shrank when washed and dried.

title: Great hoodie for the price, and for the material
body: I have a grey Champion hoodie already, but wanted a red one. They are both great. The material is somewhat more environmentally responsible, and the fit/design is excellent for the price. I use these hoodies for working out. If you're looking for something more fashionable (something for more than bumming around the house or gym), there are better options, but this classic is perfect for basic hoodie warmth & comfort.

title: I really like it and its warm
body: I really like it and its warm. The only reason why I'm giving it 4starts is because it is a little larger of how I expected.

title: Not really fleece
body: This item is just a sweatshirt.  When someone says fleece, I think it's that fluffy material material that jackets and all kinds of clothes are made out of.  There are really nice hoodies out there that have a sweatshirt type outer layer as shown in this picture and fleece on the inside.  That's what I was expecting.

title: Good fit and value
body: Wore it after pre-use washing. Excellent loose fit (I'm about 5'-7" tall and weigh about 140 lbs.) but would have liked to have garment with more full closure at neck front. Hood is good and comfortable but I would have welcomed a little larger fit in front.

title: Great Jacket
body: I am female and I usually wear a large.  I got this jacket in a medium and it fits perfectly.  It is very well made.

title: Great hoodie
body: I bought this for my husband and he wears it all the time. It's made nice, washes well and is soft. We will purchase again.

title: Perfect
body: Perfect product! Wasn't sure if it was going to fit properly or not because I hate when coats or jackets rest on you with the bottom at an angle. That is not the case with this jacket. Exactly what I was looking for.

I found the material to be of good quality. It will come in handy for my Alaska trip in May when a person just needs layering. I would recommend this hoodie.

title: You can always count on Champion products
body: After repairing other hoodies, not being able to find hoodies in his size, hoodies that fell short in the "fit" department, cheaply made, etc - I returned to Champion and am not disappointed.In October, I purchased the hoodie in both black and navy (it's mid March now) and these articles of clothing have been well-worn and are in excellent condition, still. It washes well, doesn't lose it's shape or shrink.  The fleece is warm but not overly done.  Hub's happy with it (them) so I can't complain.

Interior sheds a little bit but not enough to be a big deal - was fine after I washed it a couple times. Will definitely purchase again.

body: It's simple, comfortable, fits great, and is not too warm, not too gold.  And the price is right!  The Goldilocks of sweatshirts.

title: Five Stars

title: All You Could Want in a Hoodie
body: I ordered this for my husband, and he absolutely loves it. It is warm, fits well, and is stylish to boot. The material is heavier and better quality than I expected, and the lining is very soft. We will be ordering at least one more in a different color. All in all, you can't beat this product for the price!

title: Great until you wash it
body: I gave this as a gift, and the recipient really liked it right up until he washed it the first time. At first glance it seems like the great quality I expect from Champion. Unfortunately when it was washed (cold water, hung to dry) the inside pilled like CRAZY. Even inside the hood looks raggedy. For the price I definitely expected better. It's only getting the 3 stars for being warm & not shrinking. Would not repurchase or recommend.

title: Soft and very comfortable.
body: I love it. It's soft and comfortable. I wear it or it's military green twin quite often and I'm able to wear them in all types of temperatures.

title: Great Sweatshirt
body: My husband love's Champion's Hooded Sweat Shirts the best.They wash and dry beautifully and are true to size.Comfy warm and light. Always have at least 3 or 4 in different colors.Good price.  Highly recommend.

title: Five Stars

title: Bought for my husband & he loves it!

title: This jacket is great

title: WARM JUST IN TIME
body: Received this a day earlier than expected.  Fast shipping.  Fits perfectly.  Just as sub freezing temps hit, I got my hoodie.  Keeps mecozy warm at work and looks great.

title: Best sweat/weekend hoodie top ever
body: Very light and comfortable top. In my opinion the best possible for this good of a price. It looks good enough for everyday use as well.

title: Three Stars

title: Nice fit and roomy
body: I got an XL which has a bit of extra room. I can wear a large as well. I like the color and it fits great.  I wash it to shrink it when I need to, but it can fit someone who uses a large as well.

title: all-purpose hoodie - zipper quality issues
body: update:  changed from 5 stars to 3 stars because of an issue with the zipper.bought 2 of these to replace on older champion hoodie that held up for years.that hoodie was used daily 6 months per year for years before the zipper broke.now i have a zipper that broke after 3 months.the older jacket had a zipper with metal teeth. these have nylon zippers.very comfortable.since it fits a little loose i can layer underneath it when i want to.ordered my regular size XXL for 6'0'' and 225 lbs.holding up well after 20 or 30 washings.i only wash in cold water and dry on low heat.i haven't noticed any shrinking or pilling.

Was really disappointed that it did not look like the picture on the page as I liked the contrast between the 2 colors.

title: The zipper is key
body: I have tried numerous brands of hoodies and the only difference between them is the quality of the zipper. I have thrown away perfectly good shells only because the zipper broke. Champion seems to have the best ones that I have found.

title: Not grey strings - My son was disappointed
body: I know this sounds silly, but my 12 year old really, really want a black sweatshirt with white strings.  I don't know why.  He is 12.He thought this one was close enough with grey strings.  However, when it arrived, it only had black strings.  I told him I would return it for him, but he decided to keep it anyway.Otherwise it looks nice and fits the way I expected.

title: Frays quickly and way too big.
body: I ordered a large, which is usually my size for hoodies and jackets.  I'm a decently tall guy, so mediums usually come up to my belly button and I have to order larges.  This particular one should be called "wide", not large.  This is definitely not a product tailored towards a thin body type and looks pretty bad.  The cuffs also are made of a really soft cotton and shred within the first few weeks.  All around poor design and shoddy quality.

title: Nice product

title: A really good buy
body: I think this is the nicest hoodie I have ever worn.  I am 260 pounds and have a 52" chest and this is the first time I have had a hoodie at this price that actually fit me.  The material is very comfortable on my skin and plenty warm enough.  The garment seems to be well made and I expect to have this for a long time to come. I really do think this is as good a value as you are going to find in the market today, brick and mortar or online.

title: beautiful basic necessity, versatile and well made.
body: This is some of the most beautiful basic clothing i've bought my sons. The fabric is true, and the fit is regular u.s sizing. It's stain resistant if you scotch guard it. The white is nice and can tolerate quite a bit, but heavy sauce will seep between the weave. The fabric tends to whick away moisture, so when my sons sweat, the odor is not over powering. A light *hot water wash on *delicate is perfect. This is great .

title: PERFECT FIT!!
body: This is perfect!  It is lightweight and extremely warm! I have been looking for a hoodie for awhile and it surpassed what I expected.  I will be purchasing another hoodie (Black) next week.

title: Five Stars
body: Champion quality fit as expected. No knockoff.

title: Great weight. I actually ordered a second one because ...
body: Great weight. I actually ordered a second one because the price was really great for the quality of the product.

title: Comfy and Snuggly
body: This size large, dark navy, made in Honduras fleece hoody provided the perfect amount of flex/movement.  I'm 5'9" and 190lbs and the sleeve length was long enough that I could raise both arms over my head and the cuffs would still stay at my wrists and not drop to the middle of my forearms.  I'm a size 44 chest for coats and this size hoody was allowed the full range of motion to include crossing my arms without feeling any resistance from the back stitching.A very comfortable fleece hoody with nice styling and a price under $13 with free prime shipping. I'll purchase one or two more at this price point and even give them as gifts to family and friends.  You won't be disappointed.

title: Two Stars
body: I don´t like it, the product is awful

title: Very comfy and warm
body: Very comfy, nicely made, keeps me warm, very versatile to use alone or under a jacket.  Good price.  This is my second purchase.

title: seriously comfy Hoodie
body: I might have to buy another one of these because my girlfriend has hijacked the first one.  I was amazed at the quality of this Hoodie especially for the price.  Its very soft, has a nice large hood, and extremely comfortable and warm.  Highly recommend.

title: Good quality product
body: Just as advertised

title: Good sweater
body: Good sweater.  Decent quality.  Not bad at all for the price.

title: old and 6'2' their arms are long and these jackets fit good. They were very proud to wear them
body: Got 2of these for twin grandsons, they are 16 yrs. old and 6'2" their arms are long and these jackets fit good. They were very proud to wear them.

title: Five Stars
body: Very nice.

title: Very Nice for the Price!!!!
body: I needed a replacement sweater, because im a big dude and i've had my old reebok sweater for a long time it had holes in it. So i needed something low priced but fit. and ordered two of these sweaters...I love the fact it's warm but it's skin like thin like underarmor and 3x is very big for me i have alot of space left over to move around in...Very nice for the price... I love these sweaters I just wished they came in more colors and have different designs...

title: Good for the price
body: Looks good and is confortable, but after 2 washer it start to lose the color making look an old piece.

title: Decent for the Money
body: Very thin material, fits fine but is perhaps a little short. The arms of the hoodie are so big Hulk Hogan would have a hard time fitting them in his prime. For something so cheap I guess it is very much a 'you get what you pay for' thing. I only bought this for the gym, so it works absolutely fine for my purposes... it's just not a hoodie you'd wear to a social gathering if you want to look good.

title: Chiefs Red Jacket - Better than Expected
body: Very true to color and heavyweight.  Love this jacket!!

title: Champion Mens Eco fleece full zip navy
body: i really like it, my only problem is that  This one feels thinner and cheaper than the  Oxford gray one I bought 2 years ago .  It's a nice dark navy color in person  Got the pants to go with it .  I recommend if you wear it in the winter  Wear duo fold or fruit of the loom  Long underwear.

title: Cozy
body: a cozy zip up sweatshirt.  Nice weight, good color.  Goes with sweats, jeans, easy to wash and wear. A good buy.

title: Bought product in more than one color
body: A really well made product.  My daughter loves it and wears it alot.  I bought more than one color.
